alert.note: Alert for Eastern Albany; Eastern Schenectady; Hamilton; Montgomery; Northern Fulton; Northern Herkimer; Northern Saratoga; Northern Warren; Schoharie; Southeast Warren; Southern Fulton; Southern Herkimer; Southern Saratoga; Western Albany; Western Schenectady (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Albany (Eastern New York and Western New England)
info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued January 07 at 4:15AM EST until January 07 at 7:00PM EST by NWS Albany
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 7 PM EST THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Snow will continue throughout the day. Additional snowfall accumulations of 3 to 5 inches are expected. Accumulations totaling 6 to 10 inches with locally higher amounts near 12 inches in higher terrain regions of the Southwest Adirondacks and Southern Greens are expected. Winds gusting as high as 30 to 40 mph in the higher terrain areas. * WHERE...Mohawk and Schoharie Valleys, Greater Capital Region, southern Vermont, Lake George and Saratoga Region, and the Southern Adirondacks. * WHEN...Through 7 PM EST this evening. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult today due to snow covered roadways and reduced visibility. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Though unlikely, there is a non-zero probability of higher snowfall rates up to 0.5 inches per hour throughout the day which could reduce visibility.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency.
